patterns: how many courses are there in this university
responses:
The University of Dhaka is one of the largest universities of Bangladesh, 
DU to provide enviable higher education in Science, Business and Arts to students in Bangladesh.
For bachelor's Degree in Information Technology we have been offering the specialization in BSc (Hons) Computing.
For Bachelors in Business Administration we have been offering the followings:

1. BBA (Marketing) with International Business 

2. BBA (Accounting & Finance) with International Business

3. BBA (International Business)

patterns: how long will be BSc or BBA course
how long will it take to complete BSc or BBA course
responses: Our college offers 4 year-long a BSc course and 4 year long BBA course.

patterns: what is the location of the university
responses: University of Dhaka is situated in the heart of Dhaka. It is surrounded by shahbagh, sohrawardy udyan, old dhaka

patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester
how long will be a single semester
responses: The single semester will be around 6 months.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses: Admission requirements can be found in university website

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
are how long are the classes?
responses: There maybe  two or three classes per day. Each class will be of 1 hour and 30 minutes.

patterns: what is the teaching style of this university?
Is the teaching pattern different from another university?
responses:
Our university has different teaching patterns than other colleges in Bangladesh. We adopt a British teaching methodology, following the LTW techniques which stands for Lecture, Tutorial and Workshop.
You can provide us with your contact details and our counsellors  s hare all reach out to you and provide you with further details.
There are written exams which carry more weight than your assignments. The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.
You can message us here at any hours. But our University premises will be open from 7:00 am to 5:00 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the university conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our university not only provides excellent education but also encourages a students to take part in different curriculum activities. The university conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Carnival, Holi festival, and Christmas. 
 Also our university has basketball court, badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the university?
what are the facilities of university for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our university provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, classes with AC, discussion room, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.
